message: Let's start with a fair split.  I think 60/40 is a good place to begin.
I think a 55/45 split is a bit more fair, as it gives me a slight advantage but still leaves you with a decent amount. Let's see if we can reach an agreement this round.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm still aiming for a more even split. Let's try 52.5/47.5 this time. We can't keep letting inflation eat away at our gains!
